androidx.test.internal.runner

Class TestRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.test.internal.runner.TestRequestBuilder

  • public class TestRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for Request that builds up tests to run, filtered on provided set of restrictions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TestRequestBuilder(Instrumentation instr, Bundle bundle)
      Creates a TestRequestBuilder

        Creates a TestRequestBuilder
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addPathsToScan

        public TestRequestBuilder addPathsToScan(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> paths)
        Instruct builder to scan the given paths and add all test classes found. Cannot be used in conjunction with addTestClass(java.lang.String) or addTestMethod(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) is used.
        Parameters:
        paths - the list of paths (.dex and .apk files) to scan

      • addPathToScan

        public TestRequestBuilder addPathToScan(java.lang.String path)
        Instruct builder to scan given path and add all test classes found. Cannot be used in conjunction with addTestClass(java.lang.String) or addTestMethod(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) is used.
        Parameters:
        path - a filepath to scan for test methods (.dex and .apk files)

      • setClassLoader

        public TestRequestBuilder setClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
        Set the ClassLoader to be used to load test cases.
        Parameters:
        loader - ClassLoader to load test cases with.

      • ignoreSuiteMethods

        public TestRequestBuilder ignoreSuiteMethods(boolean ignoreSuiteMethods)
        Instructs the test builder if JUnit3 suite() methods should be executed.
        Parameters:
        ignoreSuiteMethods - true to ignore all suite methods.

      • addTestClass

        public TestRequestBuilder addTestClass(java.lang.String className)
        Add a test class to be executed. All test methods in this class will be executed, unless a test method was explicitly included or excluded.
        Parameters:
        className -

      • removeTestClass

        public TestRequestBuilder removeTestClass(java.lang.String className)
        Excludes a test class. All test methods in this class will be excluded.
        Parameters:
        className -

      • addTestMethod

        public TestRequestBuilder addTestMethod(java.lang.String testClassName,
                                        java.lang.String testMethodName)
        Adds a test method to run.

      • removeTestMethod

        public TestRequestBuilder removeTestMethod(java.lang.String testClassName,
                                           java.lang.String testMethodName)
        Excludes a test method from being run.

      • addTestPackage

        public TestRequestBuilder addTestPackage(java.lang.String testPackage)
        Run only tests within given java package. Cannot be used in conjunction with addTestClass/Method.

        At least one addPathToScan(java.lang.String) also must be provided.

        Parameters:
        testPackage - the fully qualified java package name

      • removeTestPackage

        public TestRequestBuilder removeTestPackage(java.lang.String testPackage)
        Excludes all tests within given java package. Cannot be used in conjunction with addTestClass/Method.

        At least one addPathToScan(java.lang.String) also must be provided.

        Parameters:
        testPackage - the fully qualified java package name

      • addTestSizeFilter

        public TestRequestBuilder addTestSizeFilter(TestSize forTestSize)
        Run only tests with given size
        Parameters:
        forTestSize -

      • addAnnotationInclusionFilter

        public TestRequestBuilder addAnnotationInclusionFilter(java.lang.String annotation)
        Only run tests annotated with given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the full class name of annotation

      • addAnnotationExclusionFilter

        public TestRequestBuilder addAnnotationExclusionFilter(java.lang.String notAnnotation)
        Skip tests annotated with given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        notAnnotation - the full class name of annotation
